## Picture `r fontawesome::fa(name = "camera")` {.t6}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}

![](assets/sensors/picture.mp4){fig-align="center"}

:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

### On CAPI

- Can retake as needed
- Exports as
  - image name in the microdata
  - folder of images grouped by `interview__id` in the binary data

### On CAWI

Upload an image file

### Notes

See more [here](https://docs.mysurvey.solutions/questionnaire-designer/questions/picture-question/)

:::

## Signature `r fontawesome::fa(name = "signature")` {.t6}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}

![](assets/sensors/signature.mp4){fig-align="center"}

:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

### On CAPI

- Enable as `Use signature pad`
- Draw signature
- Export as image

### On CAWI

- Upload an image file

### Notes

See more [here](https://docs.mysurvey.solutions/questionnaire-designer/questions/capturing-signatures-with-a-picture-question/)
